description:
SELF-ISOLATION // FURNITURE SONGS

## SOUND ON ##

Third song of the album "Furniture Songs", composed by Gabriel Politzer; sound artist, musician and biologist from Rio de Janeiro.

The composition originates on a trip to Bueno Brandão - south of Minas Gerais,  Brazil - in the apocalyptic and chaotic context of the pandemic. As the name of the song sugest, Self-Isolation is a melancholic song fitted for some of us that still suffer from social distance since the covid. Perfect for listening indoor during rainy days.
 
The process of creation and production was minimalist done, only with a laptop, a headset and a lot of research on musical theory. Inspired by the DIY culture, "Furniture Songs" shows that virtually anyone can create their sounds without the need for expensive and specific equipment and hard work.

Track: 3 of 6
Genres: Chill-Out, Ambient, Lo-Fi
Master: Rodrigo Paschoal
Release Date: Apr 30, 2021
